titleInfo.title: Officers of the Nashville Health Department, circa 1897

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A picture of the Officers of the Nashville Health Department, sourced from the “Reports of departments of the City of Nashville for the fiscal year ending December 31, 1897.” Pictured: Joe Smith, E.L. Corbitt, W.A. Binns, W.M. Lyons, R.G. Collins, J.W. Cavert, Dr. G.F. Hager, and George L. Smith. The yearbook consists of official reports of the City Government of Nashville, Tennessee, with a Message of the Mayor R.H. Dudley to the City Council members, dated Jan. 13, 1898. This publication was prepared for the press by James T. Bell, Recorder. Forms part of the City of Nashville published reports. 1 yearbook.

titleInfo.title: Publications, City of Nashville reports, 1897 yearbook
